action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the types of livestock for which bonus depreciation is available.

section.header: Expansion of livestock available for bonus depreciation

subsection.text: Subparagraph (E) of section 168(k)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: In the case of any dairy producing calf or cow, subparagraph (A) shall be applied without regard to clause (ii) thereof.

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2012, in taxable years ending after such date.
